targets.expr: pve_cpu_usage_ratio{instance="$instance",id="node/$node" } / pve_cpu_usage_limit and on(id) pve_node_info
pve_cpu_usage_ratio{instance="$instance",id="node/$node" } / pve_cpu_usage_limit and on(id) pve_node_info
((pve_cpu_usage_ratio{instance="$instance"} / pve_cpu_usage_limit) * on(id, instance ) group_left(name, type, node) pve_guest_info{node="$node"}) and on(id, instance ) pve_up == 1
pve_memory_usage_bytes{instance="$instance", id="node/$node"} / pve_memory_size_bytes and on(id) pve_node_info
pve_memory_usage_bytes{instance="$instance", id="node/$node"} / pve_memory_size_bytes and on(id) pve_node_info
(pve_memory_usage_bytes{instance="$instance"} / pve_memory_size_bytes * on(id, instance) group_left(name, type, node) pve_guest_info{node="$node"}) and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1
pve_disk_usage_bytes{instance="$instance", id="node/$node"} / pve_disk_size_bytes and on(id) pve_node_info
pve_disk_usage_bytes{instance="$instance", id="node/$node"} / pve_disk_size_bytes and on(id) pve_node_info
pve_disk_usage_bytes{instance="$instance"} / pve_disk_size_bytes{instance="$instance"} * on (id, instance) group_left(name, type, node) pve_guest_info{node="$node"}
((rate(pve_disk_write_bytes{instance="$instance"}[5m]) + rate(pve_disk_read_bytes[5m])) * on(id, instance) group_left(name,node, type) pve_guest_info{node="$node"}) and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1
(rate(pve_network_receive_bytes{instance="$instance"}[5m]) * on(id, instance) group_left(name, type, node) pve_guest_info{node="$node"}) and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1
(rate(pve_network_transmit_bytes{instance="$instance"}[5m])* on(id, instance) group_left(name, type, node) pve_guest_info{node="$node"}) and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1
sum by (id, name, node ) (pve_guest_info{instance="$instance", node=~"$node",template!="1"})
sum by (id) (pve_up{instance="$instance",template!="1"} and on (id, instance) pve_guest_info)
sum by (id) (pve_cpu_usage_limit{instance="$instance",template!="1"} and on (id, instance) pve_guest_info)
sum by (id) (pve_cpu_usage_ratio{instance="$instance",template!="1"} / pve_cpu_usage_limit and on (id, instance) pve_guest_info)
sum by (id) (pve_memory_size_bytes{instance="$instance",template!="1"} and on (id, instance) pve_guest_info)
sum by (id) (pve_memory_usage_bytes{instance="$instance",template!="1"} / pve_memory_size_bytes and on (id, instance) pve_guest_info)
sum by (id) (pve_disk_size_bytes{instance="$instance",template!="1"} and on (id, instance) pve_guest_info)
sum by (id) (pve_disk_usage_bytes{instance="$instance",template!="1"} / pve_disk_size_bytes and on (id, instance) pve_guest_info)
((pve_cpu_usage_ratio{instance="$instance"} / pve_cpu_usage_limit) * on(id, instance) group_left(name, type, node) pve_guest_info) and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1
(pve_memory_usage_bytes{instance="$instance"} / pve_memory_size_bytes * on(id, instance) group_left(name, type, node) pve_guest_info) and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1
pve_disk_usage_bytes{instance="$instance"} / pve_disk_size_bytes{instance="$instance"} * on (id, instance) group_left(name, type, node) pve_guest_info
(rate(pve_network_receive_bytes{instance="$instance"}[5m]) * on(id, instance) group_left(name, type, node) pve_guest_info) and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1
(rate(pve_network_transmit_bytes{instance="$instance"}[5m])* on(id, instance) group_left(name, type, node) pve_guest_info) and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1
((rate(pve_disk_write_bytes{instance="$instance"}[5m]) + rate(pve_disk_read_bytes[5m])) * on(id, instance) group_left(name, type) pve_guest_info) and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1
